text: This list of most luminous stars is of Milky Way and Magellanic Cloud objects. A few stars in other local group galaxies can be seen in enough detail to work out their the luminosities. The list is more or less complete for stars down to 2,000,000 times the luminosity of the Sun. Many of these stars are too (far away or) distant to be (seen without or) observed (without a telescope, or) with the naked eye.
